    void
    contactComboClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    populates the contacts combo box with contacts populates the month combo box with unique months using OLs and lambdas LAMBDA #3: for each lambda iterates through observable list full of contact, month, and type names every unique name is set into the combo box this is more efficient and saves compute.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      populates the contacts combo box with contacts populates the month combo box with unique months using OLs and lambdas LAMBDA #3: for each lambda iterates through observable list full of contact, month, and type names every unique name is set into the combo box this is more efficient and saves compute.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resouceBundle -
